price: Sεdeε mobεgye Nyankopͻn ne Ne Somafoͻ no adie, na moaboa (Ɔsomafoͻ) no, na moadi no nni, na mobεbͻ (Onyankopͻn) abodin atontom no anͻpa ne anwummerε.
arabic: لِّتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُۚ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: litu'minū bil-lahi warasūlihi watuʿazzirūhu watuwaqqirūhu watusabbiḥūhu buk'ratan wa-aṣīlan
